results.title: Influence of simvastatin on LDL-subtypes in patients with heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia and in patients with diabetes mellitus and mixed hyperlipoproteinemia.
results.text_hl: This suggests that the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on LDL-subtype distribution depends on the type of underlying @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006951 @@@hyperlipoproteinemia@@@.

results.title: Clinical study on the effect of simvastatin on paraoxonase activity.
results.text_hl: The study demonstrated a statistically significant @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ lowering effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on total and LDL cholesterol, and an increase in @GENE_PON1 @GENE_5444 @@@PON1@@@ activity in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with both types of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006951 @@@hyperlipoproteinemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Muacević-Katanec D, Bradamante V, Poljicanin T, Reiner Z, Babić Z, Simeon-Rudolf V, Katanec D. Clinical study on the effect of simvastatin on paraoxonase activity. Arzneimittelforschung. 2007;57(10):647-53. PMID: 18074758

results.title: The influence of simvastatin alone or in combination with gemfibrozil on plasma lipids and lipoproteins in patients with type III hyperlipoproteinemia.
results.text_hl: Nineteen adult @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_III @DISEASE_MESH:D006952 @@@type III hyperlipoproteinemia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006951 @@@HLP@@@) and homozygosity for @GENE_APOE @GENE_348 @@@apolipoprotein (apo) E2@@@ were treated with the @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@3-hydroxy-3-methyl glutaryl coenzyme A (HMG CoA) reductase@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (20 or 40 mg per day) alone or in combination with the @CHEMICAL_Fibric_Acids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D058607 @@@fibrate@@@ derivative @CHEMICAL_Gemfibrozil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015248 @@@gemfibrozil@@@ (450 mg per day) during a 30-week @SPECIES_9606 @@@outpatient@@@ study.

citations.NLM: Feussner G, Eichinger M, Ziegler R. The influence of simvastatin alone or in combination with gemfibrozil on plasma lipids and lipoproteins in patients with type III hyperlipoproteinemia. Clin Investig. 1992 Nov;70(11):1027-35. PMID: 1472833

results.title: [Long-term hypolipidemic treatment of mixed hyperlipidemia with a combination of statins and fibrates].
results.text_hl: Aim of the study was to evaluate efficacy and safety of long-term treatment of @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@fenofibrate@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_ciprofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C019304 @@@ciprofibrate@@@ therapy in the high-risk group of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with severe mixed @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006951 @@@hyperlipoproteinemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Zeman M, Zák A, Vecka M, Romaniv S. [Long-term hypolipidemic treatment of mixed hyperlipidemia with a combination of statins and fibrates]. Cas Lek Cesk. 2003 Aug;142(8):500-4. PMID: 14626567
